doc.field: Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)

The associations series consists of 65 linear inches of materials arranged alphabetically by name of association. The correspondence, minutes, and publications in this series contains little information about the University. The information pertains to a number of professional educational organizations to which Hester and NYU belonged. It relates to the broader educational world, and only rarely gives insight into NYU. However, the series shows the attitudes of educational administrators during the mid and late 1960s and early 1970s.
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
